articles.description: Sammy Hagar's Ferrari supercar will now be auctioned off this fall rather than next week after an inspection revealed it needed a battery replacement.
articles.content:
Fans hoping to score Sammy Hagar’s rare Ferrari supercar at auction this weekend will now have to wait until the fall. 
The original high-voltage battery in the rock legend’s 2015 LaFerrari was foun… [+2077 chars]
